trans-unit.source: Represents a file name extension to be associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 表示要與應用程式相關聯的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to use for files that use a particular <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於 使用特定<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>的檔案圖示

trans-unit.source: The name of the file that contains the icon.
Gets or sets the description of the file type for use by the shell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 shell 所使用的檔案類型的描述。

trans-unit.source: A description of the file type.
Gets or sets the file name extension to be associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要與應用程式相關聯的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: The file name extension to be associated with the application.
trans-unit.target: 要與應用程式相關聯檔案名稱副檔名。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that uniquely identifies the file association's file type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可唯一識別檔案關聯的檔案類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name that uniquely identifies the file type.
trans-unit.target: 名稱可唯一識別檔案類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.DefaultIcon*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，用來序列化檔案關聯<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.DefaultIcon*>為 XML 檔案的屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.DefaultIcon*>

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of this file association's DefaultIcon.
trans-unit.target: 這個檔案關聯的 DefaultIcon XML 表示法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，用來序列化檔案關聯<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*>為 XML 檔案的屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*>

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of this file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*> value.
trans-unit.target: 這個檔案關聯的 XML 表示法<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*>值。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Description*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，用來序列化檔案關聯<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>為 XML 檔案的屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of this file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*> value.
trans-unit.target: 這個檔案關聯的 XML 表示法<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>值。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.Extension*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，用來序列化<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*>為 XML 檔案的屬性。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*>

trans-unit.source: An XML representation of this file association's <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*> value.
trans-unit.target: 這個檔案關聯的 XML 表示法<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*>值。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.FileAssociation.ProgId*>
